title: Tombs: Junji Ito Story Collection
description: FRESH NIGHTMARES BROUGHT TO YOU BY HORROR MASTER JUNJI ITO.Countless tombstones stand in rows, forming a bizarre town. What fate awaits a brother and sister after a traffic accident in this town of the dead? In another tale, a girl falls silent, her tongue transformed into a slug. Can a friend save her? Then, when a young man moves to a new town, he finds the house next door has only a single window. What does his grotesque neighbor want, calling out to him every evening from that lone window?
author: Junji Ito
